subject: Order SSN5212
description_text:
Why does it take several days to ship out from Chino Ca?  I live 30 mins from Chino. Can’t this be picked up do I don’t have to wait several days for nothing?


Sent from the all new AOL app for iOS

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Ivy,  I see that the order has already been delivered, as the product only arrived in the warehouse yesterday.
